title:
Radial singular solutions of fully nonlinear equations in punctured
  balls
authors: Isabeau Birindelli, Fran\c{c}oise Demengel, Fabiana Leoni
abstract:
We study fully nonlinear uniformly elliptic equations having a singular
reaction term with inverse quadratic potential and an absorbing superlinear
term of p-power type. We consider equations posed in punctured balls centered
at the origin, and we prove that all radial solutions are singular around the
origin, by providing a complete classification in dependence of p of their
asymptotic behavior near the singularity.
